Function to convert data.table to fixed width:

Source: R/Utilities.R
fixedWidthDataTable.Rd

Function to convert data.table to fixed width:

fixedWidthDataTable(
  x,
  columnSeparator = " ",
  lineSeparator = NULL,
  na = "-",
  list.pretty = FALSE
)

Arguments

x

The table to modify.
columnSeparator

The string to separate columns by, defaulted to a single space.
lineSeparator

The string to separate lines by, defaulted to a NULL, which keeps the output as a vector of strings.
na

The string to replace NAs by, defaulted to "-".
list.pretty

Logical: If TRUE wrap the output in a list in the case that pretty is TRUE.

Contents
